local_intent: Approach and precisely align to the drawer handle from pregrasp, verifying proximity.
assumptions: TCP yaw already set (90 deg) from prior step; handle remains visible.
coherence_with_global: Matches the GLOBAL_BT phase where the end-effector approaches and aligns to the drawer_handle with tolerance 0.005 and timeout 1500, preceded by visibility check and followed by proximity verification.
